Server module

Server.broadcast_msg(sock, msg, excl_addr=None)[source]

Encrypt and send msg to all clients except exclude.

Server.handle_encrypted(msg, addr, sock)[source]
Decrypt incoming AES-GCM message and broadcast:

  • Verify client is known

  • Decrypt and authenticate

  • Send to all other clients

Server.handle_pubkey(key, addr, sock)[source]
Perform RSA handshake:

  • Decode client’s RSA public key

  • Generate random AES key

  • Encrypt AES key under RSA

  • Send AES key packet

  • Store AES key for addr

Server.init_server()[source]
Start UDP server:

  • Bind to address

  • Loop: handle public-key handshakes and encrypted messages
